message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even beyond the $10,000 worth you mentioned.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident this price reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $13,000 is still a bit high for me though.  Would you be willing to accept $11,500?  This is a fair price that allows us both to get a good deal.
